titles.title: Stop Pentagon Price Gouging Act
Stop Pentagon Price Gouging Act
To prevent price gouging at the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
